experience.title: Student Teacher
responsibilities: Collaborated with a mentor teacher to design and deliver daily lesson plans for Grade 9 and 10 Biology classes.
Utilized diverse instructional strategies to accommodate students with IEPs and 504 plans, ensuring inclusive classroom participation.
Integrated educational technology such as SMART Boards and Google Classroom to enhance student engagement and track assignments.
Facilitated parent-teacher conferences to discuss student performance and developed targeted improvement plans.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
experience.organization: University of Washington - Department of Biology
responsibilities: Supported lead instructors in facilitating laboratory sections for over 60 undergraduate students.
Prepared lab materials, demonstrated proper safety protocols, and assisted students with data collection and analysis.
Maintained records of student attendance and grades using the university's Learning Management System.
